body.name: Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Bottles - 9 oz - Baby Bottles for Newborn Babies 0+ Months - Self Sterilizing Newborn Bottles with Slow Flow Soft Flex Nipple and Advanced Venting System
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 22 mins
features: ANTI-COLIC BOTTLES FOR BABIES 0+ MONTHS: Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Bottle features a venting system that helps reduce colic, spit-up, burping, and gas
EASY TO CLEAN: Self-sterilizing bottle system uses only the bottle's components, water, and a microwave to make every feed a safe one; Venting system can be disassembled for a thorough clean
SLOW FLOW NIPPLE BOTTLE: Slow-flow design is ideal for newborns; Soft Flex Simple Latch Nipple is designed to encourage latching; Soft silicone nipples have internal ridges to prevent collapsing
9OZ CAPACITY: This slow flow bottle for newborn babies holds nine ounces (270 mL) of milk or formula

BABY ESSENTIALS MUST HAVES: Dr. Talbot's offers baby care products, baby stuff for soothing, homeopathic care, and nursery, boasting patented innovation in all its categories; Dr. Talbot's baby items make great baby gifts, and travel essentials

SAFETY FIRST: Parents can feel safe knowing Dr. Talbot's anti-colic bottles are developed, researched, and manufactured to exceed all government safety regulations and standards; Our products are made with BPA-free materials
body.description: Less reflux means less fussing and more enjoyable feedings for parents and babies. Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Bottle has a venting system that draws air to the base of the bottle, helping to reduce colic symptoms like wind, reflux, and fussing. This baby bottle also features a Soft Flex Simple Latch Nipple designed to mimic mom's nipple and encourage latch-on. Plus, internal ridges prevent the nipple from collapsing while your baby is feeding. When feeding time is over, sterilization is easy and convenient. The bottle's multi-part venting system can be fully removed for thorough cleaning, and the bottle's self-sterilizing system uses only the bottle's components, water, and a microwave. Dr. Talbot's bottles are made from BPA-free materials for parents' peace of mind.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Disassemble all parts prior to washing. Boil nipples and wash bottles before using and after each subsequent use. Dishwasher safe (top rack only), or hand wash in warm water using mild liquid soap and rinse thoroughly with clean water. Dry thoroughly. Can be boiled; microwave steam sterilizer safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves these bottles
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several major bottle brands and this seems to be the one my baby prefers. Purchased this on the recommendation of a friend who found the same thing. Bottle enables us to feed at a good pace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing worse than a baby with colic.
reviews.reviewText: These seem to be helping so far. I like that the bottles are small with a newborn, the big bottles are a bit much. Breastfeeding with bottle use while at work and the nipples are great for that, less confusion.I am hoping they work for to keep gas and air away, haven't used long enough to really say anything about that. Will repost if there are any issues, but so far, all good.This review is for,Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Bottles - 9 oz (2-Pack) - Baby Bottles for Newborn Babies 0+ Months - Self Sterilizing Newborn Bottles with Slow Flow Soft Flex Nipple and Advanced Venting SystemSold by Dr. Talbot's site.

reviews.reviewText: Good bottles I'll purchase again. It should be a set without the pacifier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's nice but my bfing baby hates it unfortunately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not impressed at all.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bottle because I am sick of the dr browns ones leaking.First off these are harder to clean than the doctor browns, there are more pieces and the “self sterilization” is a pain in the rear end.Second; these leak just as much as the browns bottles. They do not leak from the nipple hole which is a plus however around the nipple seal is where they leak.Third; I do not believe these are true anti colic. The vent system makes no sense to me and I saw just as much bubbles.Overall super disappointed as I was super excited about this. Back to bottle hunting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bottles, Just Beware of Cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I really love these bottles, but the greatest warning I can provide is just to realize how much cleaning can be involved. With these bottles and honestly any of the anti-colic bottles I've come across, there are quite a few pieces to clean, so just be prepared for that. I don't find it to be a bother, because I think the benefit of reducing gas for my little ones helps them sleep so much better, so it's worth the extra time. Overall these have held up fairly well and I haven't had to replace any parts so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice easy to hold anti colic bottle. The bottle functions well and is easy to take apart and clean. Very easy to reassemble. No leaking at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than dr. browns
reviews.reviewText: These are pretty good, we had some problems with Dr. Brown's bottles but found these to be a good alternative. Ours has been anti bottle anyway, but these seem to be doing a bit better.
